data.text:
MyLink My Zone

MyLink developed by China Mobile Hong Kong is an all-rounded, Comprehensive-Smart APP offering a variety of experiences and benefits to HongKong residents. MyLink is committed to serve every aspect of daily lives in efforts to provide flexible communication service. MyLink provides users with rich life information, intelligent life applications and is also a "smart assistants" for Hong Kong residents.

â Colorful Bay Area Guid: The new GBA guide section has launched. Users can access the most service plans for the Greater Bay Area in one place, get the latest transit information, travel seamlessly to Mainland China and Macau.

â Vouchers market: With the newly opened vouchers market section, you can order local rights and interests in Hong Kong, such as coffee coupons, Ocean Park discounts, etc., and can also easily order rich mainland rights and interests, such as tea, bus, massage, etc., to meet users' diverse needs for living in the two places.

â Ar Link Notification: Added Ar Link Notification. You can not only visually view their prepaid SIM card and billing information, but also view mall orders, transportation orders, data usage and other communication notifications.

â MyLink Metaverse upgraded: You can edit MyHome layout and avatar more freely with 3D experience.

â Upgraded Shopping Experience: New cross-border bus routes for the opening of the Shenzhen-Zhongshan Link. TurboJet Hong Kong-Macau Ticket Services Online. Endless Coupons and Discounts on Top Brands, Flash Deals at Rock-Bottom Prices, More Precise Product and Service Search, Plus Coupon Center and Uninterrupted Cross-Border Logistics Services.

â "Lucky Blind Box Daily Rewards": you can win up to 10,000 MyLink Points every day, and have chances to get a series of e-coupons.

â MyGardenâs colorful gameplayï¼Daily task can earn you carbon reduction exp to help your plants grow faster; Complete plant upgrades to earn MyLink points; Completed planting can even be minted as unique NFT art pieces; The Carbon Reduction Mall offers prop packs for exchange, to decorate your very own garden. Whether it's carbon reduction tasks, plant upgrades, or NFT minting, MyGarden has prepared an array of exciting activities waiting for you to experience.

Subject to the relevant terms and conditions
